author: Jordan Oloman
title: Sony Launches $100 Million COVID-19 Relief Fund
description: Sony is seeking ways to support creative communities and help with lost education opportunities by using its technological expertise.
content: Sony Corporation has revealed that it is launching a $100 million global relief fund to help those affected by the COVID-19 pandemic.The fund was announced in a press release from Sony, which detailed the Sony Global Relief Fund for COVID-19. It's worth notin… [+1962 chars]
